text.section:
This section applies to all payors subject to the rate-setting authority of the Health Services Cost Review Commission, including:
Insurers, nonprofit health service plans, and health maintenance organizations that deliver or issue for delivery individual, group, or blanket health insurance policies and contracts in the State;
Managed care organizations, as defined in § 15-101 of this article; and
The Maryland Medical Assistance Program established under Title 15, Subtitle 1 of this article.

A payor subject to this section shall pay rates set by the Health Services Cost Review Commission under Subtitle 2 of this title for hospital services provided at:
A freestanding medical facility pilot project authorized under this subtitle prior to January 1, 2008; and
A freestanding medical facility issued a certificate of need by the Maryland Health Care Commission after July 1, 2015.
